title: Tegucigalpa
summary: Tegucigalpa (UK: /tɛˌɡuːsɪˈɡælpə/,[10] US: /təˌ-/,[11][12] Spanish: [teɣusiˈɣalpa]), formally Tegucigalpa, Municipality of the Central District (Spanish: Tegucigalpa, Municipio del Distrito Central or Tegucigalpa, M.D.C.[13]), and colloquially referred to as Tegus or Teguz,[14] is the capital and largest city of Honduras along with its twin sister, Comayagüela.[15]
